650290.name: Seasonal Event - Cossacks 3: Christmas Gift
650290.description:
Cossacks 3: Christmas Gift adds previously released seasonal event content to all our players, who missed it. Holiday gift mission would allow you to help Santa and save Christmas!

Once upon a time there was a very kind man that lived at the North Pole. He had a lot of names: Santa Claus, Saint Nicholas, Ded Moroz, Sinterklaas, etc. Each year he spent preparing for a Holday Season: Prepared presents for the good and obedient children all over the world. But he was not alone in this difficult task: He could always expect for assistance from his little helpers, the elves. When Christmas came, he harnessed the reindeer to the sleigh and traveled far and wide, as children all around the world were waiting for gifts.
But everyone liked things this way. A wicked and greedy overlord, that acted as if he had never received any gifts, decided to spoil the Holidays for everyone. With help of artfull lies and deceit he stole the reindeer, so that Santa won't be able to distribute gifts to children.
Santa immediately ordered to equip a rescue mission. Lead it, as the most experienced elf, return the reindeer and save the Holiday!
650290.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 捷克语, 波兰语, 俄语, 乌克兰语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 土耳其语
